er.corebl.mail

Class CSAMailerDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • er.corebl.mail.CSAMailerDelegate

  • public abstract class CSAMailerDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    The default delegate is designed to support compliance with the CAN SPAM Act. It modifies the mail message so that the message complies with regulations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COMMERCIAL_PREFIX
      CAN SPAM requires that you must disclose clearly and conspicuously that your message is an advertisement.
      static java.lang.String SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT_PREFIX
      The CAN SPAM act requires this exact prefix on the email subject line if an email message is sexually explicit.

    • Field Detail

      • SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT_PREFIX
        The CAN SPAM act requires this exact prefix on the email subject line if an email message is sexually explicit.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COMMERCIAL_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String COMMERCIAL_PREFIX
        CAN SPAM requires that you must disclose clearly and conspicuously that your message is an advertisement. The law provides a lot of leeway in how to do this. Here we just note it in the subject line.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • CSAMailerDelegate

        public CSAMailerDelegate()

    • Method Detail

      • appendRequiredDisclaimers

        public void appendRequiredDisclaimers(ERCMailMessage mailMessage)
        Appends information required in the subject line and body of a message for CAN SPAM compliance. If the _ERCMailMessage.dateSent() of the message is not null, then it is assumed the message has been processed already and nothing further is appended to it.
        Parameters:
        mailMessage - the mail message to process

      • isCommercial

        protected abstract boolean isCommercial(ERCMailMessage mailMessage)
        Parameters:
        mailMessage - the mail message
        Returns:
        true if a the mailMessage is commercial, false otherwise

      • isSexuallyExplicit

        protected abstract boolean isSexuallyExplicit(ERCMailMessage mailMessage)
        Parameters:
        mailMessage - the mail message
        Returns:
        true if a the mailMessage is sexually explicit, false otherwise

      • footerComponentClass

        protected abstract java.lang.Class<? extends DefaultMessageFooter> footerComponentClass()
        The class of the footer component to use. If you prefer to use something other than the default, provide a subclass of it here.
        Returns:
        class for the footer component

      • setPostalAddress

        protected abstract void setPostalAddress(ERCMailMessage mailMessage,
                    DefaultMessageFooter footer)
        Sets the postal address of the sender on the footer component.
        Parameters:
        footer - the footer component
